text: Maracalagonis (Màra) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Metropolitan City of Cagliari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 7,959 people lived there. Its area is 101.37 km². It is 86 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Communes of the Metropolitan City of Cagliari
title: Maracalagonis
